DOC.brief_summary: The Cesarean Section (C/S) rate from 1970 to 2007 in U.S is 31.8% and in Iran From 2000 to 2009 rose to 50-65%. This Surgical Procedure is not without risk. Difficult head Extraction in C/S occur in 1-2% of all deliveries. This study was designed to compare the results of delivery by vacuum in C/S with normal caesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vacuum on Fetal and Maternal Complications During Difficult Caesarean Section
DOC.criteria: term pregnant women with cephalic presentation and singleton gestation that had difficult labor and difficult head extraction during caesarean. Elective cesarean
